qoEAttributes.name: Ease of use
qoEAttributes.metaContent: Very difficult, difficult, not easy/difficult, easy, very easy

qoEAttributes.name: Usefulness
qoEAttributes.metaContent: Not at all useful, not very useful, sometimes useful, often useful, always useful

qoEAttributes.name: Responsiveness
qoEAttributes.metaContent: Very unresponsive, not very responsive, moderately responsive, quite responsive, very responsive
